trax.name: T-Rex Beast Mode
trax.description: Dinosaur form with powerful bite - grants primal strength
trax.unlock_message: You've unlocked the ancient T-Rex beast mode! Your primal instincts awaken.

gorilla.name: Gorilla Beast Mode
gorilla.description: Primal strength and agility - the power of the jungle
gorilla.unlock_message: The spirit of the gorilla flows through you! Raw power courses through your circuits.

snake.name: Snake Beast Mode
snake.description: Stealth and precision strikes - strike like lightning
snake.unlock_message: You've gained the cunning of the serpent! Your movements become fluid and deadly.

eagle.name: Eagle Beast Mode
eagle.description: Aerial reconnaissance and speed - soar above your enemies
eagle.unlock_message: The eagle's keen sight is now yours! You can see opportunities others miss.

wolf.name: Wolf Beast Mode
wolf.description: Pack hunter with keen senses - loyalty and instinct combined
wolf.unlock_message: The wolf pack accepts you as one of their own! Your leadership skills sharpen.

shark.name: Shark Beast Mode
shark.unlock_message: The ocean's apex predator awakens within you! Your attacks become devastating.

spider.name: Spider Beast Mode
spider.unlock_message: You've gained the spider's cunning! Your tactical mind weaves complex strategies.

lion.name: Lion Beast Mode
lion.description: King of beasts - natural leadership and fierce courage
lion.unlock_message: The lion's roar echoes through your spark! You command respect and fear.

tiger.name: Tiger Beast Mode
tiger.description: Solitary hunter with devastating power and stealth
tiger.unlock_message: The tiger's stripes mark you as a deadly predator! Your strikes are swift and lethal.

bear.name: Bear Beast Mode
bear.description: Massive strength and endurance - an unstoppable force
bear.unlock_message: The bear's strength flows through your frame! You become an immovable object.

falcon.name: Falcon Beast Mode
falcon.description: Swift aerial hunter with incredible precision
falcon.unlock_message: The falcon's speed is now yours! You strike with pinpoint accuracy.

dragon.name: Dragon Beast Mode
dragon.description: Mythical beast of ultimate power - fire and fury incarnate
dragon.unlock_message: The ancient dragon awakens within you! Your very presence commands awe and terror.

panther.name: Panther Beast Mode
panther.description: Shadow stalker with deadly grace and stealth
panther.unlock_message: The panther's shadow embraces you! You move like liquid darkness.

rhino.name: Rhino Beast Mode
rhino.description: Armored tank with devastating charge attacks
rhino.unlock_message: The rhino's unstoppable force is yours! Nothing can stand in your way.

scorpion.name: Scorpion Beast Mode
scorpion.unlock_message: The scorpion's deadly sting is now yours! Your enemies will fear your poison.

cheetah.name: Cheetah Beast Mode
cheetah.description: Fastest land predator - unmatched speed and agility
cheetah.unlock_message: The cheetah's lightning speed flows through you! You are faster than the wind.

crocodile.name: Crocodile Beast Mode
crocodile.description: Ancient predator with crushing jaws and armor
crocodile.unlock_message: The crocodile's ancient power awakens! Your bite is legendary.

octopus.name: Octopus Beast Mode
octopus.description: Master of camouflage and multi-limbed combat
octopus.unlock_message: The octopus grants you its wisdom! Your adaptability knows no bounds.

phoenix.name: Phoenix Beast Mode
phoenix.unlock_message: The Phoenix rises within you! Death itself cannot claim you.

mantis.name: Mantis Beast Mode
mantis.unlock_message: The mantis teaches you patience! Your strikes become perfectly timed.

bat.name: Bat Beast Mode
bat.description: Night hunter with echolocation and flight
bat.unlock_message: The bat's night vision is yours! Darkness holds no secrets from you.

kraken.name: Kraken Beast Mode
kraken.description: Legendary sea monster with crushing tentacles
kraken.unlock_message: The Kraken's ancient fury awakens! The depths themselves obey your will.

tank.name: Tank Transformation
tank.description: Heavy armor and firepower - become an unstoppable force
tank.unlock_message: Tank transformation protocols activated! You are now a mobile fortress.

jet.name: Jet Transformation
jet.description: High-speed aerial combat - rule the skies
jet.unlock_message: Jet transformation online! The sky is no longer the limit.

car.name: Car Transformation
car.description: Balanced ground vehicle - speed and versatility
car.unlock_message: Car transformation acquired! You can now blend in while staying mobile.

truck.name: Truck Transformation
truck.description: Heavy hauler with durability - built to last
truck.unlock_message: Truck transformation ready! You're built for the long haul.

motorcycle.name: Motorcycle Transformation
motorcycle.description: Speed and maneuverability - quick and agile
motorcycle.unlock_message: Motorcycle transformation engaged! Feel the freedom of the open road.

helicopter.name: Helicopter Transformation
helicopter.description: Versatile aerial support - hover and strike
helicopter.unlock_message: Helicopter transformation active! You can now provide aerial support.

submarine.name: Submarine Transformation
submarine.description: Underwater stealth operations - master of the depths
submarine.unlock_message: Submarine transformation unlocked! The ocean depths are now your domain.

spaceship.name: Spaceship Transformation
spaceship.description: Interstellar travel capability - explore the cosmos
spaceship.unlock_message: Spaceship transformation achieved! The stars themselves await your exploration.

stealth_fighter.name: Stealth Fighter Transformation
stealth_fighter.unlock_message: Stealth fighter protocols engaged! You are now a ghost in the machine.

sports_car.name: Sports Car Transformation
sports_car.description: High-performance racing machine - speed and style
sports_car.unlock_message: Sports car transformation complete! You're built for speed and style.

artillery.name: Artillery Transformation
artillery.description: Long-range heavy weapons platform - devastating firepower
artillery.unlock_message: Artillery transformation locked and loaded! Your firepower is unmatched.

space_shuttle.name: Space Shuttle Transformation
space_shuttle.description: Advanced space exploration vessel - bridge between worlds
space_shuttle.unlock_message: Space shuttle transformation achieved! You are now an ambassador to the stars.

battleship.name: Battleship Transformation
battleship.unlock_message: Battleship transformation ready! You command the seas with overwhelming force.

drill_tank.name: Drill Tank Transformation
drill_tank.description: Underground assault vehicle with drilling capabilities
drill_tank.unlock_message: Drill Tank transformation engaged! No barrier can stop your advance.

race_car.name: Race Car Transformation
race_car.description: Formula racing machine built for pure speed
race_car.unlock_message: Race car transformation complete! You are speed incarnate.

bomber.name: Bomber Transformation
bomber.unlock_message: Bomber transformation armed! Rain destruction from above.

hovercraft.name: Hovercraft Transformation
hovercraft.description: All-terrain vehicle that glides over any surface
hovercraft.unlock_message: Hovercraft transformation active! No terrain can slow you down.

mech_suit.name: Mech Suit Transformation
mech_suit.description: Humanoid combat frame with enhanced capabilities
mech_suit.unlock_message: Mech Suit transformation online! You are a walking weapon of war.

starfighter.name: Starfighter Transformation
starfighter.description: Elite space combat vessel for interstellar warfare
starfighter.unlock_message: Starfighter transformation achieved! You are master of space combat.

construction_vehicle.name: Construction Vehicle Transformation
construction_vehicle.description: Heavy machinery for building and demolition
construction_vehicle.unlock_message: Construction Vehicle transformation ready! You build and destroy with equal skill.

rescue_vehicle.name: Rescue Vehicle Transformation
rescue_vehicle.description: Emergency response vehicle with life-saving equipment
rescue_vehicle.unlock_message: Rescue Vehicle transformation active! You are hope in times of crisis.

energon_blade.name: Energon Blade
energon_blade.unlock_message: You've acquired an Energon Blade! Its crystalline edge hums with power.

ion_cannon.name: Ion Cannon
ion_cannon.description: Powerful ranged weapon that fires concentrated ion bursts
ion_cannon.unlock_message: Ion Cannon acquired! Crackling energy courses through its barrel.

plasma_rifle.name: Plasma Rifle
plasma_rifle.description: Advanced plasma weapon with devastating firepower
plasma_rifle.unlock_message: Plasma Rifle online! Superheated plasma awaits your command.

matrix_sword.name: Matrix Sword
matrix_sword.description: Legendary blade forged from Matrix energy itself
matrix_sword.unlock_message: The Matrix Sword chooses you! Its divine light cuts through darkness itself.

fusion_cannon.name: Fusion Cannon
fusion_cannon.description: Megatron's signature weapon - ultimate destructive power
fusion_cannon.unlock_message: The Fusion Cannon is yours! Feel the power that once belonged to Megatron.

star_saber.name: Star Saber
star_saber.description: The ultimate weapon of the Primes - cuts through reality itself
star_saber.unlock_message: The Star Saber has awakened! You now wield the power of the Primes themselves.

null_ray.name: Null Ray
null_ray.description: Seeker weapon that disrupts enemy systems
null_ray.unlock_message: Null Ray acquired! Its disruptive energy will confuse your enemies.

cyber_key_sword.name: Cyber Key Sword
cyber_key_sword.description: Mystical blade powered by ancient Cyber Keys
cyber_key_sword.unlock_message: The Cyber Key Sword resonates with ancient power! Its secrets are now yours.

photon_blaster.name: Photon Blaster

photon_blaster.unlock_message: Photon Blaster equipped! A reliable weapon for any situation.

thermal_lance.name: Thermal Lance

thermal_lance.unlock_message: Thermal Lance ignited! Its heat signature burns bright.

quantum_rifle.name: Quantum Rifle

quantum_rifle.unlock_message: Quantum Rifle calibrated! Reality bends to your will.

dark_energon_mace.name: Dark Energon Mace

dark_energon_mace.unlock_message: Dark Energon Mace pulses with forbidden power! Its corruption spreads.

cyber_sword.name: Cyber Sword
